attributes.action: Bring Back Conscription - one year service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All School leavers should be conscripted into the armed forces to do a minimum of one years service to the country.

This will aid in disciplining the youth of today and teach them to respect authority, it will also aid in character building.

A years service in the military will also assist the youth to "grow and mature" into responsible adults.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
